targets.query: select mean(usr) from "router_cpu" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(sys) from "router_cpu" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(nic) from "router_cpu" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(io) from "router_cpu" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(irq) from "router_cpu" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(sirq) from "router_cpu" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(io) from "router_cpu" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(used_kb) from "router_mem" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(free_kb) from "router_mem" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select dst, mean(ms) from "router_ping_ext" where $timeFilter group by time($interval), dst order asc
